item.description: "Students made it long ago," said Rincewind. "Handy way in and out after lights out." "Ah," said Twoflower, "I *understand*. Over the wall and out to brightly-lit tavernas to drink and sing and recite poetry, yes?" "Nearly right except for the singings and the poetry, yes," said Rincewind. - Terry Pratchett, The Light Fantastic
I didn't go to university. Didn't even finish A-levels. But I have sympathy for those who did. - Terry Pratchett, alt.fan.pratchett

channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.
